Gloria Allred <IIMIMI> 
Subject: RE: Another survivor 
Date: Thu, 18 Mar 2021 03:09:11 +0000 
That should work, thanks. Mind sending me the names and email addresses of participants, please? 
 Original Message 
From: Mariann Wang
Sent: Wednesday, March 17, 2021 10:54 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Gloria Allred 
Subject: 
Re: Another survivor 
Sure, how 
about April 2d at 12.30pm? 
> On Mar 17, 2021, at 4:02 PM, S wrote: 
> Hi 
Mariann, 
> Hope you're well too, thanks. April 1 is pretty full on my end now. Would April 2 work for an interview with 
this survivor, 
please? 
> Thanks, 
 Original Message 
> From: Mariann Wang 
<=111==> 
> Sent: Wednesday_, March 17, 2021 8:48 AM 
> 
To: 
> Cc: Gloria Allred 
> Subject: 
Another survivor 
> I hope you're well. We have another survivor who would like to share her information/what happened to her. If 
you're willing/open, perhaps we could just add her to April 1st, or let us know what you prefer. She is someone 
who was abused by Epstein on one occasion in 2004. 
> Thank you, 
> Mariann 
EFTA00024031
